fundProfile.investmentStrategy: Diversified European equity investment strategy focusing on large-cap companies with strong fundamentals and growth potential
fundProfile.investmentUniverse: European listed equities across all sectors

sustainabilityRiskIntegration.identificationProcess: Basic sustainability risk screening using third-party ESG ratings to identify material sustainability risks
sustainabilityRiskIntegration.assessmentMethodology: Quantitative ESG score integration in risk assessment models alongside traditional financial risk metrics
sustainabilityRiskIntegration.integrationInDecisionMaking: ESG risks considered alongside traditional financial risks in investment committee decisions
